website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably-priced option for discriminating feline appetites – 24 cans and a variety of seafood recipes make it the best deal the brand has to offer.
pros: A top-selling variety pack in several of cats' preferred flavors: seafood, tuna, and salmon
Recipes include meaty morsel, pate, and chunky blend textures with flavor-enhancing gravies
cons: A few reports of upset stomach
Some consumers commented that their cats devour the gravy but leave the chunky pieces behind

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this stuff. I started feeding them wet food twice a day after reading that it's healthier for your cat than dry food. I have noticed an improvement in their coat, making them very shiney 👌🏻 I used to only get gravy lovers (my cats won't touch any kind of pate) but find the grilled kind have more meat in them and you can mix a little water with em to make a kind of gravy if that's what your cat prefers.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Danger

customer_reviews.title: Dessert
customer_reviews.text: The furry ones love this. I use it as a treat once a day for my 22 year old lady.
customer_reviews.author: high clouds

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: After learning that wet food is better for cats as they require a higher moisture content, I've been making the switch to wet food. This is one of the first ones I have tried, and I'm happy to say that my cat goes crazy for this flavor. She can be picky too, but if it has seafood, she is generally happy. I'm also happy because the cans have individual openers on the top, so I don't need to fuss with the can opener. I could probably say this is her favorite cat food that I give her, and I'm glad that I can find this bundle on Amazon, since it is definitely worth the money over buying individual cans.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: We are not happy with this purchase,for some reason our cat eats this same food when bought at our local store but won't touch this food that was purchased and shipped to us it seams to have a different smell so we couldn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We ordered several of the Grilled Seafood variety boxes and it almost seemed like our cats fur was getting softer and shinier
customer_reviews.text: Nothing too "Fancy" about this product but it is a middle grade cat food that the cats definitely devour. We ordered several of the Grilled Seafood variety boxes and it almost seemed like our cats fur was getting softer and shinier. The tuna cans are a big hit with my feline friends and the value for these boxes cant be beat. Each can is a pretty good size portion so we usually split one can between two cats and supplement with hard treats to keep their teeth clean and Blue Wilderness dry food.
customer_reviews.author: ChauffeurA.

customer_reviews.title: From France??
customer_reviews.text: I bought a case of grilled beef for our cats. Although a favorite flavor for years...they would not touch it. Smelled it and walked away. I called Purina. I discovered that this batch was not made in Milwaukee, but was made in France. Different beef, different texture, different gravy and different smell. I am hesitant to buy again. I've bought from Amazon before and the cans didn't have this issue. The Purina made in USA has 2 black lines of imprint on the bottom. The ones from France are red with 5 lines of printing.
customer_reviews.author: 4cats&counting

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast Grilled gets Two Paws Up!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, Bella and Giuseppe. And they have a buffet to choose from. Cat treats, dry food, and two types of Fancy Feast. I used to give them on can of pate to split and it would last all day. When I decided to purchase a few cans of the grilled variety they schnared it down in just a few minutes!! So, the case with different flavours of the grilled variety is their #1 choice. Especially now that they’re getting older, I want them to eat as much as possible to make sure they get the nutrients they need. And, I trust Fancy Feast - I always have!!
customer_reviews.author: BoulderBeachBabe

customer_reviews.title: Yes it's cheap, but our cats won't touch it!
customer_reviews.text: We have two very sad kitties here, neither one is the slightest bit interested in this food. Now we know why it's such a cheap deal. We usually buy Fancy Feast Paté (rather than the "Grilled"), which our cats scarf up immediately. Cats need a high protein content, from real protein. Read the ingredients on these "grilled" cans and note those not good for a cat's diet: wheat gluten, soy protein, corn starch and corn oil. Besides which, the "food" looks like bits of rubber. Will be heading out to buy something more healthy. Meanwhile, we're stuck with 45 cans of this stuff. We bought 48 cans and tried one of each to see if they were interested.
customer_reviews.author: B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: My little spoiled brats absolutely love Fancy Feast
customer_reviews.text: My little spoiled brats absolutely love Fancy Feast. They never leave a trace after chowing down like they do with other brands. It is not gross to me like other cat foods which make me nauseous just from the smell after cracking open the can, never mind the gross appearance of cat food. Fancy Feast actually looks very appetizing with no disgusting smell and I have no problem feeding this to my two furry bundles of fluff. It makes them very happy and me very happy. The price is very good too. I have tried lots of brands from every price perspective and Fancy Feast wins with me and my kitties. Highly recommend Fancy Feast.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The pride has spoken.
customer_reviews.text: this is one of several wet cat foods that I use along with other dry foods I feed my cats so they have a varied menu, they seem to like it that way. However, when they see me take these cans out of the container, they will surround me and back me up to the corner of the kitchen and give me that look of "We're going to jump you if you don't open those cans soon enough." Needless to say my cats get their way, seems the seafood fancy feast is by far their favorite.... and I get to live another day.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: The Feral cats & Mr Possum won’t touch it
customer_reviews.text: I feed a colony of feral cats so I get different cases of the fancy feast variety. They must be getting super spoiled because they don’t touch this particular flavor. None of them do. You think one out of nine will eat it but none of them... I’m stuck with a case of 24. Even the possum who comes to visit the cat food won’t eat this flavor either. Find this super odd. Therefore my suggestion is skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jl33NYCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast Beef in Gravy a bad lot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Fancy Feast in Gravy . My cat Patty would not eat it. She loves and eats only Fancy Feast in gravy, her favorites are Beef this one and Chicken and Turkey. This product must have been a bad lot from the company or the vendor because Patty would not eat it at all, I tried can after can of this batch and she just refused to eat it after smelling it so I had to throw all 22 cans left away. After throwing this away I was able to purchase Fancy Feast Beef in Gravy in a store and she went back to loving it and eating it every time I put it down for her.
customer_reviews.author: J. Musil

customer_reviews.title: Gives Cats  Good Variety --  supplements their Diet
customer_reviews.text: My cats (2 out of 3, at least), do love these 3 flavors... the 3rd one likes the gravy, but that's cats for you. For years, I fed my 2 cats just dry food, but they gained too much weight. Giving them each 1/2 can of this twice a day is sort of like if they caught something in "the wild". And their weight went down. Of course now, at mealtime, one won't leave me alone -- til it's "feast" time. And price is good. I now get 2 boxes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.Redd

customer_reviews.title: My cat will only eat pate, classic, I ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat will only eat pate, classic, I wish Fancy Feast would not have started making grilled, chopped, gravied, etc, it must be cheaper to produce. I will never buy any other kind than classic, unless it is by mistake
customer_reviews.author: Sonia H. Maulsby

customer_reviews.title: Very popular with our felines
customer_reviews.text: We currently have two adult cats. One does not tolerate dry kibble very well; the other can (& does) eat any type of food we put down for them. We give one can to each cat in the morning; in the evening they split one can. Kibble is also provided, and plenty of fresh water. The cats have learned to demand (one might say "beg" if talking about canines) their Fancy Feast at the appointed feeding hours. They are ingenious in finding ways to get our attention. Both eat immediately when Fancy Feast is put down for them. The bowls are nearly licked clean when we pick them up for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kate

customer_reviews.title: Da Cat Loves this.
customer_reviews.text: This is his favorite Need I say more? He is de Boss.
customer_reviews.author: Merle W Turnage

customer_reviews.title: Fresh cat food and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: My cat is picky and seems to grow tired of different brands of food often. She loves Fancy Feast right now, however the serving size is smaller than she is used to. I found this seller had one of the best prices and the variety I needed. I was able to receive 1 day shipping which is great. I have only purchased this item twice and have had no issues with the freshness of this food from this seller. I will be placing another order today and in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Butler

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of flavors in shreds and slices - no pate or mush here
customer_reviews.text: Free Cat has become persnickety in the 7 months since he found us. At first he was thrilled to eat anything in his bowl as long food appeared twice a day. Lately though, he's exerting his Siamese Superiority and refusing to eat certain flavors or textures. For example, he will not touch anything in a pate formula, nor will his highness eat any sort of chicken canned food as of last week. Fortunately, he scarfs down three of the four flavors in this collection. He tolerates the tuna here, but I refuse to be cowed by a 7lb cat. Although, I have to admit that the tuna does smell a little....ripe.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & Horses

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Stomach
customer_reviews.text: One of our cats has a sensitive stomach and will throw up his food every few days after eating. I got a grain free food and these wet ones that I give him half of. He threw up the first time he had the green one but I tried it again a few days later and he was fine. He loves these and we haven't had any normal puking in the middle of the night. Our other cat hasn't been begging or eating as much. We were using meow mix because they were eating that when we adopted them but I'm glad I finally made the change.
customer_reviews.author: CoupleONuts

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received a previously opened box with 2 cans missing for my first order as a subscription item of this cat food. So a bunch of the cans I DID get were dented from moving around inside the box. Disappointed and will be un-subscribing from this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it! But don’t feed this same flavor everyday.
customer_reviews.text: My cats are used to eating all types of fish but have never had cheese. I thought maybe they won’t like it or throw up, but they loved it - even more than their usual food. I wish there was a variety pack of different types of fish and cheese cans because eating the same flavor everyday gets tiring. Will not feed this same flavor everyday, will alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Amenah

customer_reviews.title: Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: Fancy Feast use to be a great product. I am beginning to notice that the product is not as good as it use to be. The meat is very stringy. It was not like this years ago. I have been using this same product for over fifteen years. My cats depend on this and so do I. The fact is they love the grilled beef. They always cleaned their plates, but lately they are leaving some behind. Cats do not like to eat stringy meat, just like humans do not like to eat stringy meat. Let's get it together Purina and get back to being the best in the business.
customer_reviews.author: dpuz

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I feed my cats a mix of canned and dry food. I used to feed my cats expensive, grain-free food and they would eat it for a while, but then decide they didn’t like it. I was tired of spending a fortune on cat food that would go to waste so I went on a search for a more reasonably priced cat food that had meat as one of the first couple ingredients. Fancy Feast has won my cats over. Their first ingredient is broth (fish, chicken, etc) and the second ingredient is meat (salmon, tuna, chicken, etc). My cats love it and usually finish their entire meal! My wallet also thanks me for switching to Fancy Feast.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Artificial stuff
customer_reviews.text: I experimented with these products because I wanted to "treat" my kitties. I read the labels and cringed. Although my low rating of this product includes consideration of such factors as flavor, portion size and value for money, the biggest reason for my discontinuing this product for my cats is that it contains artificial color/ flavor. My cats don't know what is not good for them so they love the taste. As cats, color doesn't matter to them, so why the color? Anyways, I don't recommend this product or similar products that contain things I myself won't eat.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Buyer Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Cats Eat it.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all foods, from the more expensive to these. Ordinarily, I would never buy Purina, but my two cats have proved to be royal pains in the butt when it comes to food and they would rather starve than eat the "healthy" cat food. We would buy 1-2 flavors and add them to the mix for a few weeks, but these were the only ones they consistently ate. I'd rather they ate 100% all natural, meat, organic type foods, but when they're crying because they're hungry at 3AM with full bowls, I will give them whatever it takes to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: nadler369

customer_reviews.title: and all the other cans of chicken and beef were just fine and he didn't have any problems with them
customer_reviews.text: I think this was spoiled as every time my cat ate it he vomited it up. Never had this happen before, and all the other cans of chicken and beef were just fine and he didn't have any problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Teal-Coray

customer_reviews.title: This flavor is was stopped our older cat from eating any and all Fancy Feast wet food
customer_reviews.text: Something about this grilled chicken wet food was horrible to our older cat. She went from spending a year and a half wolfing down the Fancy Feast we gave her with her medicine mixd in (pate, gravy lovers), to turning her nose up at this one and any subsequent flavor we tried to give her. She has no problems eating her normal food or eating treats, but Fancy Feast for some reason is done for her thanks to this grilled chicken version. It looks nothing like the the pictures -- it is not flaky and more like a pulverized pate.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Erstad

customer_reviews.title: DENTED CANS
customer_reviews.text: Hi, received my order of 24 cans of the Fancy Feast Whitefish and Cheddar Cheese Feast and Gravy today, our cats love it. Just 1 problem and it’s not that big a deal but 2 of the cans were dented pretty badly. When I open the dented cans, the product is usually bad gravy has turned to water and I won’t feed it to the cats. I’m thankful it was only 2 cans. I also purchased 24 cans of the Turkey & Cheese & Tuna & Cheese, all those cans were fine, NO dents. This review is just to let you know the denting is happening, I will continue to purchase the Fancy Feast.
customer_reviews.author: Kat45646

customer_reviews.title: Our kitty loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I have had canned kitty food that she would turn her nose up at it, or just not eat much. She dives right in on this and a few other flavors we order from Amazon. I can buy this locally, but they do not always have enough of the flavors she likes to last a whole week, without having to stand there and pick through them all to get enough, therefore I buy mostly by the case on Amazon. This gives me plenty to last longer and I don't have to shop every week for it, nor spend so much time on a shopping trip picking through the kitty food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purina Grilled Chicken Cat Food Is A Staple In my Household.
customer_reviews.text: The best judge of this canned cat food is my cat, and he usually finds it to his taste. But, as is the way with cats, sometimes he requires a change of pace and I keep a ready supply of other canned cat foods along the same lines (beef, tuna, and, rarely but occasionally, salmon) to satisfy his desire for an alternative. He detests turkey and giblet, so we avoid those. But grilled chicken is generally welcome although lately he has shown a preference for grilled beef. He is a cat and therefore entitled to change his mind.
customer_reviews.author: Perry M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My cats love the cans in this box
customer_reviews.text: My cats enjoy everything from Fancy Feast including this variety box. Each can comes with lots of gravy for the gravy lovers like my cats. The pieces of meat are small which my cats really seem to like. I buy several different kinds of boxes each month for them and this one is at the top of the list. They eat their entire dinner and never leave anything on the plate. My cats are happy and that makes me happy. Would recommend this box to my fellow cat owners for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Loves Reviews

customer_reviews.title: For some reason my cats like this crap
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's crap. Weird slivers of homogenized protein that came form god knows what. It looks and smells gross. I feel bad for feeding this to my cat. They loves this crap, and prefer it over stuff that looks like actual food. Go figure. These are the animals that enjoy tenderly licking their own anus. I'll trust my cats' judgement on this one since they're able to determine what is nutritionally valuable to them.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad Cesarz

customer_reviews.title: cat's favorite usually
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but when I order this seafood feast Fancy Feast case from Amazon my cat doesn't like it, but when i buy the same exact case from grocery store, he gobbles them all up. This is not a new problem and had happened in the past, so i stopped ordering from Amazon and only got it at the store. recently due to covid-19 stay at home orders, I ordered 4 cases, and time it was the purple can he literally won't touch. Something's a little different.
customer_reviews.author: cmmny

customer_reviews.title: Prefer salmon
customer_reviews.text: Fancy Feast is a great cat food to help in emergencies when your cat decides it won't eat anymore. It is a potentially deadly situation. If it doesn't eat for 24-48 hours your cat might refuse all food and it will quickly die. Not sure what it's called, have not researched it, but I have experienced it over the decades. Be very careful when changing foods, keep track of EVERY cat to make sure all are eating. If not, offer it some fresh Fancy Feast (or Medleys) immediately. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanPride

customer_reviews.title: This was awful...throwing out
customer_reviews.text: All cans in first row came dented...Package was opened and taped back shut one... can was dented so bad it had opened and the whole inside was molded black.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel297

customer_reviews.title: most of my cats like it
customer_reviews.text: The cats eat it. Every so often though they won't eat it. Makes me wonder what ingredient is in that can. PLEASE PURINA DO NOT CHANGE THIS FORMULA. My cat is highly allergic to fish. YOU CHANGED the pate by adding fish. My cats loved that food until the change.
customer_reviews.author: piece of my mind

customer_reviews.title: FORMULA CHANGE?
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved this stuff and now barely wants to smell it. I am annoyed and will have to change to another product. I just read some of the complaints on this product and it appears that the formula has changed and there are numerous complaints here on amazon. I am not happy about this product change and who knows what exactly is going on but they will hear from me.
customer_reviews.author: irene Garden

customer_reviews.title: My Kitty's favorite.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size can that opens easily and is sufficient for one full meal. I scoop it out as cats don't normally like diving deep into the can. My kitty was recently sick and this is what got her eating again. The only thing she'd eat more of is actual tuna (which I'm considering switching to - given that it's liked, same price or cheaper and without many additives) but this is the 'cat food' she'd choose over any other kind (tried about 20 flavors of this and other brands).
customer_reviews.author: liv

customer_reviews.title: Jack's Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky cat and he LOVES this variety pack and cleans his plate after each feeding. The portion size is good and this was money well spent. I highly recommend and will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this, the salmon and tuna grilled varieties for my cats for 3 years now. I have all of these auto shipped monthly. Something has changed with this product. These are the only flavors that my picky cats will eat but now they won’t touch any of these. I noticed when I opened the first can the food looked more like shredded than chunks. I don’t know if they’ve changed ingredients or what but something is definitely off.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Happy cats.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats that eat wet food. They were strays that we took in and made our own. They are adorable lo ittle hellions but they are so active dry food didnt do it for them with caloric intake so one of them were just skin and bone. I added 2 cans of this to their diet. Yes they share, but they are siblings so they're used to it. We now have this on auto order they love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Crossy JTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Don’t throw boxes
customer_reviews.text: 5 dented cans I can’t use. As I had a cat get sick on one before. So I’m out those cans and being on a fixed income at holiday time stinks.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Crack for Cats
customer_reviews.text: Not sure of the rating of the flavor as I haven’t tasted it myself, however our cat wakes us up every morning at 5:30 on the dot so we can give her a can. It must taste like angels. If we don’t get up right away, she will open and shut the cabinet doors, banging them loudly so that we can’t sleep. Over. And over. Louder. And louder. She is very manipulative and will do anything to get this cat food in the mornings. She will for sure plot my death if I quit buying this for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Napier

customer_reviews.title: Cat won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grilled food because the same brand pate I buy was no longer available in seafood. She loves the pate, but she will not touch this grilled stuff, not in any of the flavors. Luckily we supplement her wet food with a nice dry food, so she can make do and not go hungry, but I guess I will have to donate this or toss it, and look for something else..
customer_reviews.author: Grammy KM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Cats Healthy and Reduces Vet Costs
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't killed my cats yet. I started feeding a bit too late for my 6 year old with kidney problems. Has been a lifesaver for the now 4 year old Bengal that had mysterious grand mal seizures and asthma come on at 1 1/2. Between this and the Gravy Lovers, they're the only ones I'll feed my cats. As long as he doesn't find something else to snack on he stays seizure and asthma free. I can't figure why. I will never feed my cats dry food again. Until I start making my own fresh food for them this is the best option and keeps them healthy.
customer_reviews.author: ChaoticHarmony

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves the seafood, & prefers food with gravy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not convinced that a cat food with gravy made of corn starch is the best nutritional choice, but I can barely get it from the can to the cat food bowl before it begins to disappear! I actually stir in a little extra water, since cats get most of their moisture from their food. The cats still love it, so I feel like a good pet mom & they’re getting food they enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: VZ

customer_reviews.title: Fussy cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: The fussy cats love it. We have tried both the chicken and turkey varieties, and they clean their plates (Sometimes Chickie cleans her plate and Kami's as well!). A little more pricey than some, but well worth it, because there is no waste. I have about ten different brands and varieties of cat food, both wet and dry, and this will be a staple from now on. Almost makes me want to sample it myself!
customer_reviews.author: jcfriend

customer_reviews.title: My sick cat ate it
customer_reviews.text: I always feed my cats organic and grain free only, but in this specific case one of my cats got very sick and I had to get her to eat, and this is what she chose, so here I am feeding her this food again and then changing it for the organic grain free one as she gets better. I do not recommend this food unless you really have to, here are the reasons: Wheat Gluten, Meat By-Products, Corn Starch-Modified, Artificial and Natural Flavors, Salt, Tricalcium Phosphate, Soy Protein Concentrate, Added Color
customer_reviews.author: MediaBoxEnt

customer_reviews.title: My Kitty loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love this stuff! I have one that is very old and very sick and loves how much gravy is actually in it. Unlike many of the other gravy Fancy Feast products, she actually eats the "chunks" and "cheese" in this one along with sopping up all the gravy! For some reason she likes the chicken better than the other Delight flavors, but I am sure that's just her personal preference. They all come well packed and shipped very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyMazz

customer_reviews.title: MY CAT LIKES THIS AND I LIKE THE PRICE  :-)
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to get her (my cat) off the expensive--VERY expensive--cat food for some time now, and this is one of the lower priced cat foods. Surprise! The ingredient list is the SAME things as the pricey one! No surprise, she likes this one, so I've been ordering it for her now. This is my second or third order and we're both happy (her and me).
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves This
customer_reviews.text: After trying tons of holistic etc expensive food and cleaning vomits after each one of them I decided to try Purina Fancy Feast for my 15 year old picky boy and bingo! I used to buy this at Target until I realized I could order it online and save myself lots of time and energy! Happy cat happy mama! Thank you for great packaging and fast delivery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fidana

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast with Cheddar cheese is not liked by my cat. He loves food with gravy not cheese.
customer_reviews.text: My fault for ordering 48 cans of cat food with cheddar cheese. Well my cat loves this brand with gravy but he has no interest in cheddar cheese, I highly recommend Fancy feast with gravy but not with cheddar cheese. Glad that its new product has extra gravy. Does anyone know a good recipe for cat food with cheddar cheese. My next dinner party guests might like it as a dip or stew? Maybe on chips.
customer_reviews.author: Caviar cugat

customer_reviews.title: Sick Kitten
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding my cat fancy feast wet food for months, but it's been the chicken, turkey, and beef flavors. I switched to the seafood flavors this week and my cat has begun having terrible diarrhea. There have been no other changes to his diet besides the flavor of the food. Unfortunately I ordered this food in March and am only now feeding it to him, so the time period for returns has ended, but hopefully you can avoid the same mistake I made!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fancy feast > other brands
customer_reviews.text: After trying a numerous amount of different brands because my picky ass cats would either vomit after eating or completely refusing to consume it, we tried Fancy Feast. They love anything from this line of cat food. One of my cats was mainly fed Fancy Feast for her entire life and she lived to be shy of 22. Ive learned my lesson with cat food; only buy fancy feast.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina Gama

customer_reviews.title: Our Cats Love This!
customer_reviews.text: We can't buy enough of this flavor. Some of our cats will eat nothing else. They all love it and it's hard to find in the numbers we buy. We go thru cases of this. It's one of the few flavors that doesn't go thru our cats turning their noses up at it after awhile. It's a consistent flavor all the time, apparently no changes to turn the cats off.
customer_reviews.author: booknutzz

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Having read most of the reviews on this food, I ordered it as my kittens/ cats now, didn't like other brands that were called shreds and something else... looked like little chunks in gravy. Anyway, the cats love this canned food, they get a little every morning and evening with a pate. They are small cans as opposed the larger 5 oz cans for the other types of wet cat food which is the only down side.
customer_reviews.author: trpsmom

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast is a hit with most cats and this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my precious kitty passed away due to a stroke. She normally didn't like wet food but started wanting it. It was easier on her stomach, as she was 16. She loved Fancy Feast in most of the flavors. Salmon was her favorite. It's cheaper to buy it in the packs rather than by the can. I found it to be a little less on Amazon, too.
customer_reviews.author: pjo48

customer_reviews.title: sending wrong item even though ordered right food, sent turkey instead of chicken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered chicken / cheese and 3 yes 3 times I ordered this I and received turkey and cheese that my cat WILL NOT EAT, I thought it was the right food so I thought I had extra. By the time I opened it was past the return date. This IS MY LAST TIME or I will just go to Chewy. If its wrong I will send it ALL back and you can do what you want , like throw it away. Greg
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat eats this like a fiend.
customer_reviews.text: I asked my cat what he thought of this food but he couldn't stop eating it long enough to even meow at me. I take that as a sign he likes it. Sadly though he's had some mouth issues of late, so we've switched from the grilled to the pate variety but he loves them both and continues to wolf it down. Just smells a little fishy to me. Cans are easy enough to open with the pull tab which I like. Car seems content and well fed so 5 stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cats will not eat ANYthing else
customer_reviews.text: I thought they just didn't like wet food until I tried this and - well there is nothing else they will eat (except for their dry food in addition to this.) They won't eat Pate but LOVE the grilled with gravy. And even though the name is fancy - the price is not!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C

customer_reviews.title: She eats this exact can if I buy it anywhere else like Target or Petco
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why my cat will not eat the cat food I ordered for her from Amazon. She eats this exact can if I buy it anywhere else like Target or Petco, but won't touch these cans from Amazon. I'm not sure if they're poorer quality?
customer_reviews.author: Bloom W.

customer_reviews.title: Cleo's new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: After years of eating Sheba, our local grocery store stopped carrying the flavor my cat Cleo liked. I tried this Fancy Feast Tuna Feast in Gravy GRILLED and Cleo LOVES it! She literally howls outside my bedroom door if (God forbid) I sleep past 6:00 AM and she wants her breakfast! She devours this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Dishy24

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Feast Seafood -  My Cats Are in Love!
customer_reviews.text: My five cats are all Members in Good Standing of the Fancy Feast Fan Club. These seafood selections are "juicy" --a good bit of gravy which my whiskered-ones seen to enjoy. Still, there is also a full serving of solid food here as well - this is not one of those all-gravy recipes. My cats range in their level of food snobbery, but they all like all three of these Fancy Feast flavors! Feast seems to be in step with the gourmet trends of the feline species! Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Helene Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Fancy feast kitty
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves the fancy feast wet foods with gravy. I alternate between dry food and wet. He is keeping a healthy weight and doesn't seem to have any digestive problems. He doesn't get people food except a little bit of ice cream... He is a happy kitty.
customer_reviews.author: jo vanhoesen

customer_reviews.title: Tastes funny
customer_reviews.text: It does not taste that good, but the cat seems to enjoy it, or at least initially. She does puke up silly string looking vomit a lot more since this new food. She also poops a lot more which has been difficult since we switched from plastic to paper bags (which rip and have a small opening). May try to switch out her food for hard food again.
customer_reviews.author: My path has heart.

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive. Not 8 of each flavor.
customer_reviews.text: My cat will eat only seafood and these are her favorites, but I was disappointed that it wasn't eight cans of each flavor. One flavor only had three cans. That's not what I thought I was ordering. There needs to be a disclaimer that you are not getting 8 of each when you order 24, but instead will get whatever the packers have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ursa Logica

customer_reviews.title: Makes my cats throw up.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor "Fancy Feast Seafood Feast in Gravy GRILLED" made both of my cats throw up tonight. They seem to tolerate the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled product!!  Picture enclosed!!
customer_reviews.text: Cans were dented! Four spoiled and leaking!Why is my complaint being ignored???
customer_reviews.author: Bess Moore

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is amazing but cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: OK - how am I supposed to rate Flavor? Or did you expect I would ask my cat? I can say the cat loves fancy feast Pate style that i used to get at Costco until they quit carrying this The cat hated this style but the dog liked it Maybe I should ask the dog about the flavor?
customer_reviews.author: Syracuse Pete

customer_reviews.title: my poor old 18 year old kitty lovesthis food
customer_reviews.text: my older kitty is picky but she loves this food today . YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN FELLOW KAT LOVERS. GREAT TODAY ,WILL NOT TOUCH IT TOMORROW
customer_reviews.author: thesewinglady

customer_reviews.title: Cars love this food, I hate the tiny cans
customer_reviews.text: My cats love love love this brand!!!!! I wish they made larger cans for us that own and feed multiple cats. I every times open one of these cans and I open probably 9 or more a day and I’m reminded how silly it is I’m not looking for a different option. In the mean time I’m a slave to these tiny cans!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I have one cat who needs this food.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat (15 yrs.) with polycystic kidney disease. She likes this food and does well on the fish variety pack. She almost died about a yr. ago, but with this food and on occasion a morsel of dry food, she has done well. She doesn't usually even need fluid therapy now.
customer_reviews.author: Joya

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality AND Kitties Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kitties are very particular and spoiled. They've tasted all the top brands of wet cat food. This one in their favorite. It has 'just the right amount of gravy' -- the Gray Lovers Version is way over the top. I can't always find this in the stores, but Amazon gets it here fast and FRESH. Fresh is very important. I've ordered it from other sellers, but it didn't quite smell the same.
customer_reviews.author: MinTexas

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: My kittie thinks she is a bonafide princess. She is very picky about her food. She usually will only eat the FF medleys. They were out of stock, so I bought this massive 24 can box for an AMAZING price. Now I just crossed my fingers if she would eat it. I ope ed a can, and she was in immediate happiness! She LOVES it! I am so happy with this purchase as well as the price. I will definitely buy again! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sherry F.

customer_reviews.title: My cat's love this
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the cheese, but I think it is... my cat's absolutely devour this food... no matter what, all of them will eat it.. Even the old man, who is picky will eat this... I'm so happy to get it from Amazon at a decent price point and delivered in a day!
customer_reviews.author: Justagirlinnyc

customer_reviews.title: My cat is stubborn as hell.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 3 years old she’s only ever eaten dry kibble (meow mix) sense I’ve gotten her. Well my vet told me wet food is a lot healthier then dry for multiple reasons I won’t go into detail, but I’m telling you my cat is damn stubborn she didn’t eat anything for like 3 days just maybe a little dry kibble because I’m not going to let her starve. Finally I tried this flavor she went to it so damn quick and stated gorging on it so damn quick I was moved like are you for real now it’s the only flavor I buy because it’s all she will eat
customer_reviews.author: zac

customer_reviews.title: but this is her absolute favorite. Now that I've been buying this
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves all wet food, but this is her absolute favorite. Now that I've been buying this, she's noticeably much more energetic when preparing her meals and eats the entire thing throughout the day, as opposed to other brands/flavors where she usually left half of it. Also, her fur has gotten noticeably softer, and she was already a soft cat!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Of all the wet foods, my cat prefers the seafood taste variety. He also likes gravy. If it's not fish, he licks the gravy & leaves the bits of food at the end of the day. With this brand, I see the bowl is almost completely empty at the end of the day. He's a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: frugal buyer

customer_reviews.title: Portions are perfect for average size cats.
customer_reviews.text: My two kitties are very finicky about their food. I had given them other popular "health food" brands and celebrity brands, but they did not like it and I ended up donating a lot of cat food to shelters. They love FF Salmon and Shrimp Feast, never leave any in the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Callihan

customer_reviews.title: so nothing really goes to waste.
customer_reviews.text: I have cat that is especially 'picky' as to what it eats, that goes goo goo over this stuff. This has been my 3rd order and he hasn't gotten tired of it yet. With many other flavors, after a week or so, he is ready to move on. Also, I found that mixing this with some of Purina's Pates, seems to make my other cats much more tolerant of a 'half-empty' can of pate, so nothing really goes to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Karl W. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: TASTES GREAT... so I've heard
customer_reviews.text: I think it's hilarious that I'm asked to rate the flavor of this cat food. Since I haven't tasted it myself, I asked my cats. They said it was pretty good, although they like Sheba paté better because it's velvety-soft and has a clear juice that they can't resist, even though it gives them heartburn.
customer_reviews.author: The Maggster

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum me like fancy feast liver and pate with gravy🐾
customer_reviews.text: my cat loves this style of chicken and liver fancy feast. I used to buy the pate but but the one with gravy instead because the price of the pate offered buy sellers was ridiculous. I was worried she wouldn’t like it but she loves it and always begs for more.
customer_reviews.author: debbon49

customer_reviews.title: The downside of it is he gets bored of dry food over time and quite addicted to ...
customer_reviews.text: One can fills 1/3 of my cat's stomach daily. The downside of it is he gets bored of dry food over time and quite addicted to any flavor of this. Be cautious not to spoil your fluffy. And one design flaw is that my cat can never get the meat on the circumference around the can bottom even with his paws digging. It's gonna be flawless if the can can be made into round bottom
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price & my cat won’t eat any other brand. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this kind of cat food so many times and my cat absolutely adores it. I think this is mostly Amazon’s part in the process, but the most recent time I bought this the item said delivered but it wasn’t. Amazon was so quick to replace the box and that made me so happy. Overall, great cat food. My cat loves the gravy cans the best & I would recommend this kind of cat food to any cat owners.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but worth it
customer_reviews.text: My cats, Oliver and Sebastian who are one year old brothers, have made the change to wet food now per recommendation from our vet. Neutered males tend to run the risk of UTI problems later on so she recommended wet food now. I've tried the poultry and beef kind, grilled and paté but end up having a bunch of crusty leftovers in their bowls. This seafood stuff is a winner! It's gross and stinky smelling first thing in the morning but they devour this with gusto. A winner and worth the fishy smell.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Okay if found at a special price.
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of cat food that should be in the 5.5 oz cans. The cats pretty much love it but still leave some that they shouldn't until it dries out and they won't pay any attention to it. Of course, cats are a pain in the *** about food but still...
customer_reviews.author: Russell D Wester

customer_reviews.title: GREAT flavor;less filling!
customer_reviews.text: This has less meat and a lot of sauces or gravy. My cats LOVE this flavor but are still hungry after eating a half can each. I noticed this after buying the pate` which fills them up and satisfies them much longer although they like the flavor of this...they like the flavor in pate` just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Most of my cats love this.
customer_reviews.text: My cats go for this and eat about 3/4 of it in a hurry. Only problem, once the gravy is licked off, the rest isn't eaten. But I will continue to feed it to them. If anyone knows a way to get the cats to eat the meat without any gravy, please let me know. I have tried adding the Beef pate but it doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Candlestick

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: My cats are picky eaters. Sometimes they will eat a variety of foods, other times no. This particular shipment, I was disappointed in as 9 of the cans are dented. The outside package was not dented, only the cans that were on the 2nd and 3rd layer.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Oops
customer_reviews.text: Ordered by mistake. I tried to cancel this order over 10 times. I would not cancel. Now I have WAYYY too much cat food.. I do NOT want this, and I want it RETURNED. My cats don't like it...won't eat it. I did not create this order - Amazon did.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R.

customer_reviews.title: Great new variety of cat food at reasonable price. Should at least try it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this cat food. It has 3 favors with bits of cheese and they gobble it up. It's great because most cat owners know how finicky cats can be and I've wasted money on foods they turn their nose up on. Also variety is the spice of life for cats same as humans so for the price it's worth a try. I have 2 cats with different tastes in food but they both love this food!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon O

customer_reviews.title: Among my cats' favorite flavors
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my cats' favorite flavors and it's the one I usually give the for their evening meals. I think they really can taste the cheese and they gobble it right down. I have two kitties, mother and daughter, both feral rescues and they are total love bunnies. Feral rescues know a good thing when they see it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Although my ragdoll cat didn’t nearly like it as much as he did with the gravy lovers, I’m sure there are cats that enjoy seafood more. I gave this a 5 star as everything else was amazing. No cans damaged, clean, and the meat inside was packed to the brim. Compared to gravy lovers, there are definitely more meat and less liquid, so you truly are getting what you paid for. If your cat prefers seafood rather than poultry and beef, give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Dajiehuang

customer_reviews.title: Cans are always dented now.
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering cat food for a couple of years now. The cans are dented and I worry about giving to my cat. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CindyRichards

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food!
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble finding Fancy Feast wet food that my cats would eat. I know my cats LOVE cheese and the grilled wet food, so I ordered this. The cats eat ALL of it all the time and beg for more (they aren't getting starved...just love the food!) I would recommend this food to any cat lover wanting to feed their cats something special!
customer_reviews.author: D Vade

customer_reviews.title: Both cats finally agree!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats. I love them dearly, but finding a food that both would eat has been a pain! It seems like whatever one cat likes, the other cat hates. Except for this pack! Both of my cats happily and excitedly eat this one. Now I don't have to buy separate brands or deal with one cat snubbing dinner and loudly protesting.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Purina Fancy Feast Gravy Wet Cat Food; Grilled Chicken Feast - 3 oz. Can, 24 Pack
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but great results with all the fancy feast canned cat foods. This one is no exception. My two cats love it and that is all that counts to me.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Martin

customer_reviews.title: This is a favorite for our kitties
customer_reviews.text: All of our cats love this food. Even our more picky cats who turn their noses up at other foods scarf this one down. This food has plenty of gravy so cats who prefer gravy will love it and they seem to really like the bits of cheese mixed in too. Will buy this flavor again.
customer_reviews.author: Seth T.

customer_reviews.title: Box short 2 cans
customer_reviews.text: The box appeared factory sealed, with the “pull to rip open” tab intact. However, the box had only 22 cans instead of 24. Not worth the time and effort to pursue a replacement nor a return. The shortage effectively increases the cost of the product. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good price if your cat or cats like it.
customer_reviews.text: I can't really give any stars for flavor because I just don't know. The flavor is supposed to be beef so we will go with that. I do know one of my cats loves it and the others won't eat it. I am glad I have one that does like it.
customer_reviews.author: Candy b

product_meta.title: Purina Fancy Feast Grilled Feast in Gravy Canned Wet Cat Food
product_meta.description: Style:Gravy| Color:Seafood Variety Pack - 24 Ct.| Size:(24) 3 oz. CansMake mealtime a memorable occasion when you serve Purina Fancy Feast Grilled Seafood Feast Collection wet cat food. Tender cuts of fish and seafood deliver the ocean flavors cats crave, and the tender texture of this soft cat food entices your cat to eat every scrumptious bite. Each recipe features a savory gravy that balances out these mouthwatering entrees, and high quality ingredients provide an exceptional level of taste. With essential vitamins and minerals to support her overall health in every serving, this gourmet cat food lets you feel good about the meals you serve. Offer up a different recipe at every feeding to keep her interested in what's being put in her dish, and let her delight in the rich flavors. She is sure to love the gourmet flavor combinations, and you can rest easy knowing she's getting 100 percent complete and balanced nutrition for adult cats. Get her favorite soft cat food delivered with just a few mouse clicks when you order this Purina recipe from Amazon.com.
feature_bullets: Tender cuts of fish and seafood for a taste cats love. Moisture content maximum is 80%
100 percent complete and balanced nutrition for adult cats
Essential vitamins and minerals to support her overall health
Twenty 4 (24) 3 Cans Purina Fancy Feast Gravy Wet Cat Food Variety Pack, Seafood Grilled Collection

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
